Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Gui = Tool:WaitForChild("DrumGui")
Sounds = {}
for i, v in pairs(Handle:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Sound") then Sounds[v.Name] = v end end
function StopSounds() for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do v:Stop() end end
function SetGui(Key, Enabled) local Frame = GuiClone.Frame:FindFirstChild(Key) if Frame then Frame.Visible = Enabled end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not PlayerGui or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end GuiClone = Gui:Clone() GuiClone.Parent = PlayerGui Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "g" then Sounds.HiHat:Play() elseif Key == "h" then Sounds.Snare:Play() elseif Key == "j" then Sounds.Tom2:Play() elseif Key == "k" then Sounds.Tom3:Play() elseif Key == "y" then Sounds.Crash:Play() elseif Key == "u" then Sounds.Tom1:Play() elseif Key == "t" then Sounds.Ride:Play() elseif Key == "n" then Sounds.Kick:Play() end SetGui(Key, true) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) SetGui(Key, false) end) end
function Unequipped() StopSounds() if GuiClone and GuiClone.Parent then GuiClone:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Head then return end Head.Anchored = true ForceSit = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Sit" and not Humanoid[Property] then Humanoid[Property] = true end end) Humanoid.Sit = true end
function Unequipped() if ForceSit then ForceSit:disconnect() end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.Sit = false end if Head and Head.Parent then Head.Anchored = false end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
